# The `HandleSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is used to form a handle around another node that is persistent and is updated across invocations of replaceAllUsesWith on its operand. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::HandleSDNode</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class is used to form a handle around another node that is persistent and is updated across invocations of replaceAllUsesWith on its operand.

This node should be directly created by end-users and not added to the AllNodes list.

Definition at line 1308 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
